content: indulge in the art of crochet with our wiggle it trivet and dishcloth set pattern this intermediate-level project offers a delightful challenge for those looking to expand their skills the set includes a 5 5 trivet and an 11 dishcloth perfect for adding a touch of handmade charm to your kitchen decor the pattern features unique post stitch construction creating a seamless and visually appealing design worked in the round the trivet and dishcloth showcase striking stripes and tons of texture adding depth and dimension to the pieces with detailed written instructions photo tutorials and video guides crocheters of all levels can confidently tackle this project **materials needed-** hook 4mm us size 6 0 yarn lily sugar n cream solids https //shrsl com/4uc0e worsted weight 100-300 yards
